1 #include "udp_bridge/statistics.h"
2 
3 namespace udp_bridge
4 {
5 
6 void Statistics::add(const SizeData& data)
7 {
8  if(!data.timestamp.isZero())
9  data_.push_back(data);
10 
11  // only keep 10 seconds of data
12  while(!data_.empty() && data_.front().timestamp < data.timestamp - ros::Duration(10.0))
13  data_.pop_front();
14 }
15 
16 std::vector<TopicStatistics> Statistics::get()
17 {
18  struct Totals
19  {
20  int total_message_size = 0;
21  int total_packet_size = 0;
22  int total_compressed_packet_size = 0;
23  int total_fragment_count = 0;
24  int total_sent_size = 0;
25  int total_sent_success = 0;
26  uint32_t total_dropped_bytes = 0;
27  int total_data_point_count = 0;
28  ros::Time earliest;
29  ros::Time latest;
30  };
31 
32  std::map<std::pair<std::string, std::string>, Totals> totals_by_connection;
33 
34  for(auto data_point: data_)
35  for(auto remote_send_result: data_point.send_results)
36  for(auto connection_send_result: remote_send_result.second)
37  {
38  Totals& totals = totals_by_connection[std::make_pair(remote_send_result.first, connection_send_result.first)];
39  totals.total_message_size += data_point.message_size;
40  totals.total_packet_size += data_point.packet_size;
41  totals.total_compressed_packet_size += data_point.compressed_packet_size;
42  totals.total_fragment_count += data_point.fragment_count;
43  totals.total_sent_size += data_point.sent_size;
44  if(connection_send_result.second.sent_success)
45  totals.total_sent_success++;
46  if(connection_send_result.second.dropped)
47  totals.total_dropped_bytes += data_point.sent_size;
48  totals.total_data_point_count++;
49  if(data_point.timestamp > totals.latest)
50  totals.latest = data_point.timestamp;
51  if(totals.earliest.isZero() || data_point.timestamp < totals.earliest)
52  totals.earliest = data_point.timestamp;
53  }
54 
55  std::vector<TopicStatistics> ret;
56 
57  for(auto totals: totals_by_connection)
58  {
59  TopicStatistics ts;
60  ts.destination_node = totals.first.first;
61  ts.connection_id = totals.first.second;
62  auto& data = totals.second;
63  ts.stamp = data.latest;
64  float count = data.total_data_point_count;
65  ts.message_average_size_bytes = data.total_message_size/count;
66  ts.packet_average_size_bytes = data.total_packet_size/count;
67  ts.compressed_average_size_bytes = data.total_compressed_packet_size/count;
68  ts.sent_average_size_bytes = data.total_sent_size/count;
69  ts.average_fragment_count = data.total_fragment_count/count;
70  ts.send_success_rate = data.total_sent_success/count;
71 
72  if(data.latest > data.earliest)
73  {
74  double time_span = (data.latest-data.earliest).toSec();
75 
76  // account for the time until the next sample
77  time_span *= (count+1)/count;
78 
79  ts.messages_per_second = count/time_span;
80  ts.message_bytes_per_second = data.total_message_size/time_span;
81  ts.packet_bytes_per_second = data.total_packet_size/time_span;
82  ts.compressed_bytes_per_second = data.total_compressed_packet_size/time_span;
83  ts.sent_bytes_per_second = data.total_sent_size/time_span;
84  ts.fragments_per_second = data.total_fragment_count/time_span;
85  ts.dropped_bytes_per_second = data.total_dropped_bytes/time_span;
86  }
87 
88  ret.push_back(ts);
89 
90  }
91 
92  return ret;
93 }
